reviews.cmt: I don\'t like the new update it is very buggy.. freezes my phone up. Won\'t allow to add to previous day.. I work overnights so when I go to add and complete it adds to present.. my view is why have this app if it won\'t work. Get it fixed and then I\'ll redownload it.

reviews.t: Won\'t even let me into the app
reviews.cmt: I have tried installing this twice now and it still won\'t let me sign into it. It won\'t load and the screens fade out into random windows. I can\'t do anything. It isn\'t as great as I have been told.

I\'m with jenny B! They said it was my phone, the reason the app isnt wrking. a samsung admirer 2 too! I cannot log new foods an I\'m thinking a new app could be nice. Fix this an 5 stars. Been using this app for 3 years, lost 57 lbs an never a problem until past 6 months or so!
How this app has 4+ stars I have no clue! 1st time user, cannot create username which comes up as invalid no matter what I put in...going to uninstall immediately!

This app is so easy to use with pretty much every food in their database. I have been using it for over a year now and have lost over 35 pounds.\tThis app is so easy to use. Almost every food is already in the calorie search. If it\'s not, you can easily add it to use for future use. It has really helped me keep track of what and how much I am eating.
This App really helps u stick to ur Calorie goals...dont cheat! Ur only cheating yourself..needs more Exercise options tho but its good and FREE!!

This has really helped me to realize just how many calories I consume and burn. It\'s nice to see a weekly average so I don\'t feel guilty & just give up if I go over my 1800 daily limit. I love the scan feature when adding foods.

I love this app. It helps manage my salt intake, which I need to do. It does have some issues, like not putting food on a proper day, and locking up once in awhile, but overall I\'m willing to wait for bugs to be fixed.

Apart from the fact that sometimes I\'m adding a food when it jumps back to the home page and sometimes doesn\'t sync straightaway with my computer, this app works brilliantly and I have lost weight already, one week in! I love the way it shows you when you complete an entry roughly how much you could weigh in five weeks - great incentive!

I love how sometimes I can find obscure Ethnic food barcodes and dishes since I can read French, Spanish, and Korean. The problem w/notating the serving size has been fixed! Or at least I think it has. Love the functions like moving items to different meals and copying meals. Just wish there were more exercise options to add in for my weight training. Sometimes it freezes and has to reset but all my info is still there. :)  All in all GREAT app!

reviews.t: Great app! Superb database includes brand and restaurant entries.
reviews.cmt: Only drawback is that recipe creation doesn\'t allow you to define serving size (unless I\'m missing something).
Was great now glitchy

This app has been the most helpful resources I have in my quest for losing weight, but as of lately it has been prone to freezing, stalling or simply not loading all. I have even experience because my phone completely off when trying to access the app. Needs a major fix for the spectrum phone
Great motivation! If ever I need to know how many calories I can find out quick and easy. Also helps me plan my day even when I get super busy.

reviews.t: Perfect tool for weight loss/ maintenance!
reviews.cmt: Easy to use, detailed, great tool for weight loss & keeps you on track & focused!!

reviews.t: Easy to use, excellent database with scanning option
reviews.cmt: I started using it 2 weeks ago and was dreading the process of recording daily intake.  I was pleasantly surprised with the user friendly interface and the flexibility to record food intake. It let\'s you track your progress and record activity as well. Good Stuff!

very convenient to track your nutrition. makes your food choices more conscious. updated ui is way better.  but that would be great too: more international foods better typing correction when searching pushing more popular sports platforms: movescount, polarpersonaltrainer, garmin connect  thanks
Its very good, it has every thing you want to know about yet its boring.... add some pictures and colors and I will rate it 5 stars
The only thing that would make it better is more strength activities calories burned so I can keep accurate track!

It seems silly that just recording what I eat would have such a significant impact. But it does. And I have to admit I get a little secret thrill when I enter my exercise for the day and my calorie count goes down.
